Delivary Restrictions

At this stage, we are unable to ship the products to the followingcountries: New Zealand, Romania, South Africa, Sri Lanka, Turkey, Turks and Caicos Islands. For individual guidance on where the fragrances ship to, please email our Customer Care team:

service@thelalu.com

Precautions

  • This product is purely handmade and retains the texture of the hand. Those who accept it can place an order.

  • Some products may have a slight drop due to the firingprocess, environment and other factors, which is normal.
